Type Ahead

Required files

SCSS files required: _components.type-ahead.scss

SCSS files optional: _components.type-ahead-group.scss

JS files required: typeahead.js

Type Ahead structure

The Type Ahead element uses the feature rich choices.js library to wrap an ordinary select dropdown.

A Type Ahead element is created using an existing select and the Type Ahead js module data-js-module="typeAhead".

A Type Ahead element options are defined by the data-options attribute, which accepts a JSON string in the following format:

                        [
                          {
                            "value": "1",
                            "label": "One",
                            "customProperties": {
                              "description": "One"
                            }
                          },
                          {
                            "value": "2",
                            "label": "Two",
                            "customProperties": {
                              "description": "Two"
                            }
                          }
                        ]

Where value is the value of the option, label is what is displayed and customProperties.description is what is searchable.

A Type Ahead element default option is defined by the data-default attribute, which accepts the value of one of your JSON options.

You can also specify the css classes to style the container, select and dropdown via the data-container-class, data-select-class and data-dropdown-class attributes.

Default Select

This is an error message.

Grouped Inputs Widget

You can wrap the select, along with an input, in a div with the class .type-ahead-group to create a grouped inputs widget, which is particularly useful for phone number fields.

Note: you must include the _components.type-ahead-group.scss file.

Markup Only

If you would like to run the component using your own javascript, but would like to use the markup and css available in the toolkit, simply copy the below markup in your code:

One
One
Two

To show the options dropdown, you can add the .is-active class to the div element with class .type-ahead__list .type-ahead__list--dropdown.

One
One
Two






Remember, in order to work with a form submit, your javascript must set the selected option into the select element.
